name: Mad Dan - Puzzle TD
description:
Dive into the world of Mad Dan! You will meet him in a Psychiatric Center and help him in a great mission: getting out from there as soon as possible.
Using his mental powers and aided by Little John (a nice mobster) you will discover bizarre characters such as "Angry plant" or "Captain Iron fist".Use your strategic skills to complete 150 levels over 3 totally different scenarios!
Combine his supernatural powers in each level and make his way through bewhiskered nurses that hold him prisoner.

Game features:

- Real time Dynamic Pathfinding.
- Outstanding different Powers!
- Over 10 types of towers
- Innovative game modes you've never seen before!
- 23 different funny enemies(5 types with different weapons)
- 150 levels with 3 grades of difficulty.
- 3 "hardcore" levels with tournaments and prizes
- 3D Menu.
- 3D Almanac.
- Play for free until the end.

Download Mad Dan now and ... Let the madness begin!
